name: Fake Affection
description:
Sometimes people hide their true intentions
Disguised behind love and affection
Spewing venom and infection
Making sure to always have your attention
Claiming that you're their extension
Almost their own reflection
Thoughts motivated by fears of rejection
Causing said loved ones to act in aggression
Leaving behind damage beyond correction
Pain and heartbreak from a fake connection
No answers to unresolved questions
All that’s left is your mind's inventions
Take a breath to exhale your depressions
And stand tall make the mold of your next redemption

New Year New Tears 2022
Everyone who collects 1 ed. of each girl dropped Jan 1-15 will receive a free ANIMATED Tears Girl - roadmap on my Twitter @Mollymmarie
